comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Hey Nicky - I'm not sure that is a real feasible item to buy online because it is very perishable. If you can't find a delicious ricotta locally, you could also try making it yourself - it is quite easy: http://www.seriouseats.com/2010/02/how-to-make-fresh-ricotta-fast-easy-homemade-cheese-the-food-lab.html

comments.author: Nicky
comments.content: Thanks Michael! I'll try making it myself and see how that goes :)
